title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 64.4 - Vendor must own and possess receipts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 64.4 - Vendor must own and possess receipts

State Regulations

No licensee holding a license pursuant to section
61
or
62
of the Alcoholic Beverage Control Law, shall sell, offer for sale, agree to sell or deliver to a retail licensee
holding a license pursuant to section
63
or
64
of the Alcoholic Beverage Control Law, in
this State, any liquor described and identified by warehouse receipts, unless
the seller is the sole and exclusive legal owner of such receipts and is in
sole and exclusive possession and control of such documents at the time of
solicitation, sale and delivery of the liquor. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
64.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
